actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.
actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5–6)

actions.description: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Cold Breath

actions.description: The dragon exhales paralyzing gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Paralyzing Breath

name: Silver Dragon Wyrmling
senses: Blindsight 10 ft., Darkvision 60 ft.,  Passive Perception 14
